apps.name: Youtube (YTLitePlus)
apps.subtitle: YTLite with more features!
apps.versionDescription:
Current YouTube IPA: "v18.25.1"  
Current YTLite Version: "v2.1"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 14.0" or later

RELEASE 18.25.1•2.1 : (July 2, 2023)

• Updated Submodules
  • YTHoldForSpeed
  • YTLite
  • YouPiP

• New tweak: YTNoCommunityPosts
  
 • Updated Youtube from '18.23.3' to '18.25.1'
 • Fixed OldDarkMode not working

Issues in this Release:
• LowContrastMode doesn't work (it work with older YT version)
apps.localizedDescription:
YTLite with more features! 

Supercharge your YouTube experience with +15 tweaks: 

• YTLite: Ad-blocking & background playback, +50 options
• iSponsorBlock: Skip sponsor ads
• YouPiP: Native PiP mode
• YTUHD: 2K & 4K video quality
• YouTube Dislike Return: Reinstate dislike counts
• YTClassicVideoQuality: Old video quality selector
• YTNoHoverCards: Disable suggested videos
• YTABGoodies: Disable A/B testing features
• NOYTPremium: Remove Premium upsell alerts
• YTSpeed: Add 2.25x to 4x playback speeds
• YTMiniplayerEnabler: Enable Miniplayer
• DontEatMyContent: Prevent notch issues
• YTShortsProgress: Enable progress bar for Shorts
• YTABConfig: Control A/B testing flags
• YouMute: Mute/unmute videos
• LowContrastMode: Reduce interface contrast
• And many more...

privacy.name: AppleMusic
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your Apple Music library.

privacy.name: BluetoothPeripheral
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires Bluetooth access to connect with nearby peripherals.

privacy.name: Camera
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to the camera to capture photos and videos.

privacy.name: Contacts
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your contacts to help you share content with your friends.

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires local network access to connect and communicate with nearby devices.

privacy.name: LocationWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your location while using the app to provide personalized recommendations.

privacy.name: Microphone
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your microphone to record audio.

privacy.name: PhotoLibrary
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your Photo Library to save photos and videos.
